CSGO并没有因为免费挂的数量增加，至少免费前后我遇到的挂都很少，只是老六与孤儿会降低你玩游戏的快乐，不管怎么说，CSGO都非常有趣。别碰箱子！

A classic! CS:GO, especially with friends is one of the most popular and grand displays of how gameplay is more important than graphics. Its competitive nature and its semi-linear map design, form the basis of its replay ability.
